Description: The following statement contains a magic number: switch (input)             {                 case "SEARCH":                 case "S":                     ViewModel.Commands["Search"].Execute(null);                     return true;                 case "RANDOM":                 case "R":                     ViewModel.Commands["PickRandom"].Execute(null);                     return true;                 default:                     string searchTerm = null;                     if (input.StartsWith("EDIT ") && input.Length > 5)                         searchTerm = input.Substring(5);                     else if (input.StartsWith("E ") && input.Length > 2)                         searchTerm = input.Substring(2);                     if (searchTerm != null)                     {                         ViewModel.SearchText = searchTerm;                         return true;                     }                     break;             }
